education.title: CSR - Education
education.description:
The time has come for practical and alternative methods of education that are complementary to the traditional system. The IT industry is blooming and Transylvania needs clever minds that will create tomorrow's products and services. PitechPlus signed a partnership with Ecole 42, from Paris and launched ACADEMY+PLUS in Cluj-Napoca, in 2014.

ACADEMY+PLUS has the mission to form tomorrow's IT specialists through a free study-program with practical modules. No teachers, but professional trainers, no grades, but level of performance, no schedule, the school is open 24/7. This is how we develop highly performing specialists and future entrepreneurs.

our-work.title: Services
our-work.description:
IT & Telecom Consulting and Solution Designing

With years of experience in telecommunication and technology, we wish to bring our customers state-of-the-art solutions using products from top technology brands in the world.

Implementation & Technical Support

With a highly technical base of knowledge, modern administration and years of experiences, we are confident we will bring our customers perfect Implementation and Technical support services, satisfying the most demanding requirements.

Training & Technology Transfer

In order to support customers during system operation time, we also provide training programs, from a basic to advanced level, using textbooks of top IT companies in the world.

success-stories.title: Success Stories
success-stories.description:
Network & Mobility

The only SI deployed IPCore Network for top 3 SP in Vietnam and deploy IPCore Network for Viettel Peru
The first SI deployed unified MPLS for Viettel me network in Vietnam, expanded to Viettel Cambodia, Viettel Cameroun
Deployed 4G EPC, MSS for MobiFone & LTE Radio station for VNPT
Provided and deployed hardware for VOCs, VMSC of Viettel, Viettel Global
Deployed Ericsson OCS for VNPT

Security

Provided Pentest and Incident Response services for Mobifone
Provided CGNAT, firewall solution for Viettel 3G/4G mobile subscribers
Provided overall security solutions for MOFA, PVI in Vietnam
Provided firewall solutions for 3G subscribers of Vinaphone
Provided proxy internet solutions for Mobifone subcribers

Data center, visualization and cloud computing

First SI in Vietnam deployed Public Cloud systems for Viettel IDC
First SI deployed biggest VDI system for Office of the Government and Mobifone branch offices
First SI in ASIA deployed the biggest server system of Sun MicroSystem E6900, M8000, M9000

grow-with-us.title: Grow with us
grow-with-us.description:
Sharing ideas, experiences and knowledge on a regular basis

We take our work seriously, and we have fun while doing it. Morning coffees in our colorful kitchen are full of laughter and serious planning, we eat our lunch at very big tables and the end of the program might be after another round of FIFA.

Project managers, team-leaders and dedicated specialists support our internal learning and development. Helping one another is something we learn everyday together. There is always someone who knows another way of solving things, and sharing it might get someone to find even a better solution.

clients.title: Partners
clients.description: Confidence in the spirit of partnership is the root of potentially lucrative business cooperation. Our heartfelt thanks to all our esteemed partners.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description:
TELECOMMUNICATION: Viettel; VNPT; MobiFone; Vietnamobile; FPT Telecom

BANKING & FINANCE: Techcombank; ACB; Sacombank

GOVERNMENT & EDUCATION: Bộ Ngoại giao VN; Tổng công ty cảng Hàng không Việt Nam; Đại học Thủy Lợi; Đại học Quốc gia Hà Nội; Học viện Kỹ thuật Quân sự

ENTERPRISE: SPT; UNDP; EVN Hanoi; Bkis; VTC; Vishipel

expertise.title: Our know-how
expertise.description:
Since our pioneering work in the early days of PHP, we have gathered a huge amount of knowledge, experience and expertise to help your business navigate the complexities of technology.

Our specialised communities use the right platform, that helps you to adapt to device innovations and offer your user a meaningful experience.

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.description:
Founded in 1995, ITC Innovated Technology for Communication Joint Stock Company (ITC JSC) has its headquarters in Hanoi, a branch in Ho Chi Minh City and a representative office in Da Nang. ITC JSC has affirmed its place as one of the few leading Systems Integrators specializing in the High-tech Telecommunication and IT markets. Its leadership position is affirmed by its clients as well as its accreditation by reputable global partners.

Our Slogan "Flexible in all integrated solutions and innovated technology", together with our strong financial foundation, stable business structure and worldwide partnership form the principle for our customer oriented services. We, ITC JSC, pledge to give our customers the best of breed products and solutions.

Core Values

Creativity brought to live from innovative technologies

Prestige earned from quality of services

Brand recognition endowed by our converged values

Dynamic structure conformed to international standards

Aspired to succeed

Vision

"Leading System Intergrator in Vietnam"

Going global, bringing customers the highest business efficiency through flexible solutions and world class services
